item.description: class: "landing-page" background: "../img/bg6.jpg" title: "Write the best title for your page." description: | --- Who are we? According to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, Ted, Scambos, NSIDC lead scentist, puts the potentially record low maximum sea ice extent tihs year down to low ice extent in the Pacific and a late drop in ice extent in the Barents Sea. "Over the span of the satellite record, Arctic sea ice has been declining significantly, while sea ice in the Antarctichas increased very slightly"
